name: icon-repository-backend
description: Serves icon information to, and accepts updates on icons from, the front-end

scripts.compile: rm -rf build && tsc && cp -r configurations build/ && npm run add-version
scripts.watch:tests: export ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev; npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "nodemon --watch build run-tests.js"
scripts.dev:import: export ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev; export ICON_DATA_CREATE_NEW=always; npm run import
scripts.dev: export ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev; npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "nodemon --watch build build/src/app.js"
scripts.dev:oidc: export ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev-oidc-wcontext npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "nodemon --watch build build/src/app.js"
scripts.test: export ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev; export IGNORE_CONFIG_FILE_CHANGE=true; npm run lint && npm run compile && node run-tests.js

author: peter.dunay.kovacs@gmail.com
